title: XGEmail
description: It supports you to access Tencent's mailbox service in Unreal project and helps you send emails quickly. It is currently recommended to send only simple verification code.
longDescription:
It supports you to access Tencent's mailbox service in Unreal project and helps you send emails quickly. It is currently recommended to send only simple verification code.

Attention:  

1.The XGEmail plugin uses only the code provided by Unreal Engine 5 and has no other dependencies;  

2.The XGEmail plugin does not collect or send any information to the plugin author;  

3.Users must register Tencent's mailbox and open the smtp service, and correctly pass the mailbox information and right click information into the plugin interface.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  It supports to send Email quickly from Tencent's mailbox service.
  •  It is executed asynchronously.

Code Modules:

  •  [XGEmail][Runtime]

Number of Blueprints:0

Number of C++ Classes:5

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation:README
